incidents.name: Toll Free Verifications Timeout

incident_updates.body: Programmable Messaging, Toll Free Verification is now operating normally at this time.

Programmable Messaging, Toll Free Verification is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate a service interruption with Programmable Messaging, Toll Free Verification. 408 instances of Toll Free Verifications timing out since Jan 25. These verifications were eventually rejected and customers were notified. We are working on resubmitting these effected verifications. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate a service interruption with Programmable Messaging, Toll Free Verification.408 instances of Toll Free Verifications timing out since Jan 25.These verifications were eventually rejected and customers were notified.We are working on resubmitting these effected verifications.We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate a service interruption with Programmable Messaging, Toll Free Verification. 408 instances of Toll Free Verifications timing out since Jan 25. These verifications were eventually rejected and customers were notified. We are working on resubmitting these effected verifications.  We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption with Programmable Messaging, Toll Free Verification. 408 instances of Toll Free Verifications timing out since Jan 25. These verifications were eventually rejected and customers were notified. We are working on resubmitting these effected verifications.  We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Intermittent 30024 Errors to Verizon and T-Mobile in the United States of America

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing intermittent, 30024 Errors to Verizon and T-Mobile in the United States of America. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body:
We observing a recovery on small subset of Twilio 10DLC numbers that were generating intermittent 30024 errors towards Verizon and T-Mobile destinations in the United States. This is mostly impacting Hosted or Ported numbers. We are monitoring this and expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

If you are still seeing traffic failing with 30024 towards AT&T and Verizon for the majority of traffic sent from your Twilio 10DLC numbers, kindly open a Support Ticket.
